Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.core

Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.scoredist

package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.scoredist
Precomputation of score distributions.

These precomputed score distributions can be used for empirical computation of p values.

Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe
  • Class
    Description
    CannotMergeScoreDistributions
    Thrown in case of problems in ScoreDistributions.
    ObjectScoreDistribution
    Precomputed score distribution for a fixed number of terms and one world object Ids.
    ScoreDistribution
    Precomputed score distribution for all "world objects" and a fixed number of terms.
    ScoreDistributions
    Class with static helper methods related to ScoreDistribution.
    ScoreSamplingOptions
    Configuration for score sampling.
    SimilarityScoreSampling
    Sampling algorithm for similarity scores.
